entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 2:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 78 %

Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 34 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers and risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
